text: “khux brrda phu ptibati tam rx sul phu pen nbi thi kheiyn xan mi pen thi phwk khea phb khea thuk caruk wi n thi phwk khea thang nı xat-tea rxt læa nı xal-xin yil doythi khea ca chı phwk khea hı kratha nı sing thi chxb læa ham phwk khea mu hı kratha nı sing thi mi chxb læa ca xnumati hı kæ phwk khea sung sing di «thanghlay læa ca hı pen thi txng ham kæ phwk khea sung sing thi lew thanghlay læa ca pldpeluxng xxk cak phwk khea sung phara hnak khxng phwk khea læa hwng khx thi prakt xyu bn phwk khea dangnan brrda phu thi sraththa tx khea læa hı khwam sakhay kæ khea læa chwyhelux khea læa ptibati tam sængswang thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ khea læw sir chn hela ni hæla khux brrda phu thi sarec”
